law.catch_line: "Educational purposes" includes those activities of schools certified by the Department of Education...

text.section: "Educational purposes" includes those activities of schools certified by the Department of Education, activities of centers for individuals with an intellectual disability and physically handicapped individuals, church schools, Sunday schools and church related functions, child care centers, day camps, or summer camps, or any other activity that provides some educational experience for its participants.
This definition shall be liberally construed.
